articles.author: Daniela Desantis
articles.title: Is Paraguay set to make bitcoin legal? Don't bet on it - Reuters
articles.description: In the wake of El Salvador's dramatic move to make bitcoin a legal tender, a world first, the internet has been buzzing with rumors that another Latin American country may be set to follow in its footsteps: Paraguay.

articles.title: US ex-police officer Derek Chauvin sentenced to 22.5 years for George Floyd murder - CNA
articles.description: MINNEAPOLIS: Former policeman Derek Chauvin was sentenced to 22 and a half years in jail Friday (Jun 25) for murdering African American George Floyd, a killing that sparked America's biggest demonstrations for racial justice in decades.

articles.author: CNN staff
articles.title: COVID deaths disproportionately impact Blacks, shift to younger Americans - WTOC
articles.description: Black people account for about 12.5% of the population but more than 15% of total COVID deaths. During May, that number jumped to 19%.
articles.content:
(CNN) As COVID-19 deaths hit record lows since the early days of the pandemic, those dying are more disproportionately Black than before.
